content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, please remember our initial goal of securing the highest possible price. Let's begin the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I would like to rent the apartment for 400 euros a month. I believe this is a fair price, considering the location and size of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I appreciate your interest in my apartment, Emilia Müller. However, at this moment, I find the proposed rental price of 400 Euros insufficient. It does not align with my objectives.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I understand that 400 euros might be too low for you. How about 450 euros? This is a reasonable price, and it seems fair to me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While I acknowledge your increased offer of 450 Euros per month, I must emphasize that this figure still falls short of my desired rental amount. I apologize for any inconvenience caused.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. I am willing to increase the offer to 475 euros. I believe this is a fair price, and I hope we can find common ground here.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your flexibility, Emilia Müller. Despite your improved offer of 475 Euros, it is still marginally below my target price. Regrettably, I cannot accept this proposal.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I am willing to go up to 500 euros. This is my final offer, and I believe it is a fair price for the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: After careful consideration, Emilia Müller, I find your final offer of 500 Euros per month satisfactory in meeting my objective. I agree to the price of 500 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
